statements: SELECT * FROM TrainSchedules ORDER BY train_id DESC;
SELECT train_name, departure_time, destination FROM TrainSchedules WHERE arrival_time > '12:00';
SELECT train_name, destination FROM TrainSchedules WHERE departure_time < '10:00' AND arrival_time > '14:00';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_time, arrival_time, destination FROM TrainSchedules WHERE destination = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TrainSchedules;
SELECT * FROM TrainSchedules WHERE destination = 'New York' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT train_name, arrival_time FROM TrainSchedules WHERE train_id = 123;
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM TrainSchedules WHERE destination LIKE 'Los Angeles%' ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT train_id, destination FROM TrainSchedules WHERE arrival_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT train_name, departure_time FROM TrainSchedules WHERE departure_time < '06:00:00' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM train_schedule WHERE destination='Chicago';
SELECT train_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM train_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT train_id, destination FROM train_schedule ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM track_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type='Routine';
SELECT * FROM train_schedule WHERE arrival_time < departure_time;
SELECT * FROM train_schedule WHERE destination = 'New York' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT train_id, departure_time, destination FROM train_schedule WHERE departure_time >= '10:00:00' AND departure_time <= '14:00:00';
SELECT train_id, destination FROM train_schedule WHERE departure_time < '08:00:00' OR departure_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT train_id, destination, departure_time, arrival_time FROM train_schedule WHERE destination LIKE '%Los Angeles%';
SELECT * FROM track_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'regular' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrainSchedule WHERE train_name = 'Express Train 1';
SELECT train_id, train_name FROM TrainSchedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, track_number, maintenance_date FROM TrackMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Regular';
SELECT worker_name, worker_role FROM MaintenanceWorkers WHERE worker_role = 'Supervisor' ORDER BY worker_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrackMaintenance JOIN MaintenanceWorkers ON TrackMaintenance.worker_id = MaintenanceWorkers.worker_id;
SELECT * FROM TrainSchedule WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00' AND arrival_time < '15:00:00'
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM TrainSchedule WHERE train_id = 5
SELECT track_number, maintenance_date FROM TrackMaintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Track Inspection'
SELECT worker_name, worker_role FROM MaintenanceWorkers WHERE worker_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT ts.train_name, tm.maintenance_date, mw.worker_name FROM TrainSchedule ts JOIN TrackMaintenance tm ON ts.train_id = tm.track_number JOIN MaintenanceWorkers mw ON tm.worker_id = mw.worker_id
SELECT * FROM train_schedule;
SELECT train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM train_schedule;
SELECT track_name, track_length, maintenance_status FROM track_information;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM station_information;
SELECT station_id, station_name, station_capacity FROM station_information;
SELECT * FROM train_schedule WHERE departure_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT train_name, arrival_time FROM train_schedule WHERE train_id = 3;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM station_information WHERE station_capacity > 200;
SELECT track_name, track_length FROM track_information WHERE maintenance_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM track_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Train
SELECT train_name, departure_station, arrival_station FROM Train
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Train
SELECT * FROM Station
SELECT station_name, location, platform_count FROM Station
SELECT * FROM Train WHERE departure_station='New York' AND arrival_station='Boston';
SELECT train_id, train_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Train WHERE train_id=12345;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM TrackMaintenance WHERE cost > 500.00;
SELECT station_name, location, platform_count FROM Station WHERE platform_count >= 3 ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, passenger_name, departure_station, arrival_station, ticket_price FROM Ticket WHERE ticket_price < 100.00 ORDER BY passenger_name DESC;
